title: Five Nights at Freddy's (video game)
summary: Five Nights at Freddy's is a 2014 indie survival horror video game developed and published by Scott Cawthon. The game takes place in a fictional family pizza restaurant called "Freddy Fazbear's Pizza", where the player takes the role of a security guard who must defend themselves from the restaurant's animatronic characters that become mobile and homicidal at night.
